display_name: Filtered: REM CHAT AHI (Obstructive apneas all desats, Mixed apneas all desats, plus hypopneas with 3% or arousal)
description: CHAT Apnea Hypopnea Index  {[(Total number of obstructive apneas) + (Total number of mixed apneas) + (Total number of hypopneas associated with >= 3% desat or arousal)] / (hours of sleep)}. Will be missing if total sleep time is 0.
calculations: 60*(oarbp + oarop + oanbp + oanop + marbp + marop + manrbp + manrop + hremba3 +hroa3 + hnrba3 + hnroa3) / slpprdp
